CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(Food_Score__c <$CustomMetadata.CER_Formula__mdt.X1_star.Domain_Star_Range__c, "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(Food_Score__c <$CustomMetadata.CER_Formula__mdt.X2_star.Domain_Star_Range__c, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(Food_Score__c <$CustomMetadata.CER_Formula__mdt.X3_star.Domain_Star_Range__c, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(Food_Score__c <$CustomMetadata.CER_Formula__mdt.X4_star.Domain_Star_Range__c, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(Food_Score__c <$CustomMetadata.CER_Formula__mdt.X5_star.Domain_Star_Range__c, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif" ))))), "Food rating")
CustomField.label: Food rating
